A11y Dialog

On top of that, this implementation provides all the usual mandatory bits from a dialog window: correct usage or ARIA landmarks, absolute freedom in regard to the styling, closing when pressing ESC, closing when clicking the background overlay, closing when clicking the close button, a simple yet powerful DOM API, for half a kilobyte of JavaScript. Oh, and also it is fully tested using a headless browser to make sure it works as intended.

No more excuse now. Make your dialog windows accessible.
